full_summary:
Tender Title: Temporary Help Services for the National Capital Region (NCR)
English: S4691425, French: APM S4691425
Reference Number: CB-136-1115012
Date of Publication: November 22, 2023
Closing Date: December 6, 2023 (2:00 PM EST)
Trade Agreements: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
Bid Notice: [TO BE COLLECTED FROM THE PROVIDER]

The Department of National Defense (DND) has issued an invitation to tender for Temporary Help Services in the National Capital Region (NCR). This services comprise supplying Special Advisors (13.9 level) who meet the security requirements set out in the Tender Notice.

The Contractor is expected to provide temporary personnel under the Employment Contract negotiated between the Contractor and the Employees. The Employees shall not undertake or hold any paid employment duties except health insurance.

Selected SA Holders were invited to submit a proposal, including:

* 1019837 Ontario Inc.
* Altis Recruitment & Technology Inc.
* Coradix technology Consulting Ltd.
* Elevated Thinking Inc.
* ENNREGS Environmental Limited
* Etico, Inc.
* IBISKA Telecom Inc.
* Maverin Inc.
* MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
* Messa Computing Inc.
* Mobile Resource Group Inc.
* Ross Holden
* T.I.7 Inc.
* The Bell Telephone Company of Canada (or Bell Canada)
* Thinkpoint Inc.

 Level of Security Requirements: Enhanced Reliability

Tender Description:
The DND has a requirement for Temporary Help Services. The selected supplier will provide advisors with excellent skills and experience. The requirement is open to those supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who qualify under the aforementioned streams and categories.

Key Responsabilities:

* Advisors shall have excellent skills and experience and possession of the identification required by the National Defence.
* Provide an update on the upcoming status within 48 hours after the EN-8.


Key Tender Requirements:

* Availability
* Maintenance and management of contractors
* employee management
* Performance entails
